articles.title: NCERT drops content on Gujarat riots from Class 12 textbook
articles.description: According to a note on the rationalised content released by the NCERT on Thursday, pages 187-189 on Gujarat riots are among the removals from the book. The pages also carry an image of the front page of The Indian Express dated March 1, 2002.
